title: Corner Lot! Gleaming wood floors & hardwood flooring with Laundry room
description: Easy living with everything taken care of for you in the desirable gated community, Reserve at Gwynedd. You are welcomed by a beautiful foyer with wainscoting and gleaming wood floors. The laundry is conveniently located off the foyer away from the living space and bedrooms. The hallway leads open living space.  Gleaming hardwood floors lead you from the entrance to the open layout of the kitchen, dining and living room, with hardwood flooring. The eat-in kitchen is full of amenities with solid surface countertops (i.e. Corian), pantry and plenty of counter space. Wainscoting is continued in the dining room which also features a tray ceiling. The spacious light-filled living room is carpeted and offers access to the balcony. The inviting main bedroom features a tray ceiling with a fan, plantation shutters, en-suite bath with private commode, soaking tub, double sinks and separate shower.  Plenty of storage in the walk-in closet.   A full hall bath and second bedroom finish off the home.   All this plus a great community including two clubhouses, indoor & outdoor pools, fitness center, billiards room, meeting room and much more! SEND NUMBER FOR MORE INFORMATION

title: Huge Amazing Loft in Callowhill
description:
Complete with designer finishes, this contemporary loft is conveniently located in an iconic Philadelphia landmark. Previously a hat factory, this historic building was turned into modern, spacious more than 12 high ceiling lofts, exposing gorgeous beams and major architectural details!
Take a look at the newly renovated kitchen which includes stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets, quartz countertops and a large farmhouse sink! The original solid wood floors throughout this loft allow for a continuous open concept with oversized windows that bring in tons of natural light!
The private bedroom allows for multiple storage areas next to the recently renovated bathroom. Marble tile accents, and classic colors are used in this spacious shower giving this space a timeless look! WIth a walking score of 95, this property is just steps away from the Rail Park, Reading Terminal Market, Philadelphia Convention Center, Chinatown, and some of Philadelphia's top museums , shops, and restaurants!
Parking may be available in the basement of the building for an additional fee. Pets are welcome here with adherence to the condo documentation.
Listing provided by Keller Williams Philadelphia

title: East Passyunk - Beautiful 2 Bed 1.5 Bath House
description:
This gorgeous home in East Passyunk will stun you with its modern industrial finishes and warm interior accents. It's wide-open first floor prominently features exposed brick and unique concrete floor. The kitchen features custom-made wood cabinets with black appliances and corian counter tops.
The second floor has two bedrooms, impeccable hardwood floors, three closets with custom built-ins and a full bathroom with a large vanity, shower and beautiful tile flooring. Central Air, Xfinity home security, energy efficient windows, custom window treatments, recessed lighting and many other small details make this a one-of-a-kind space. And don't forget its close proximity to Passyunk Avenue's restaurants, cafes and bars.
Listing courtesy of Elfant Wissahickon Realtors

title: Welcome to 222 Rittenhouse, an architecturally historic high-rise!!
description:
$500 security deposit! Available now! Welcome to 222 Rittenhouse, an architecturally historic high-rise tower on Rittenhouse Square. Beautifully situated on the west side of the Square, 222 offers revered park side living in Center City s most sought after neighborhood at a terrific value. This handsome 1920 s building welcomes residents with a stunning double height lobby. Choose from luxury studios, one, two and three-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses in a variety of distinctive floor plans. The apartments have been recently renovated to include new kitchen cabinets, countertops, appliances, fixtures, flooring and restored tile bathrooms. Units have central air, in-unit laundry, dishwashers and great closets! Many apartments enjoy views of beautiful Rittenhouse Square and the skyline of Philadelphia. Residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, fitness facility, business lounge and 24 - hour maintenance. The biggest amenity 222 provides is the unbeatable LOCATION. A short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. title: Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city
description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . The foyer is nicely tiled with to the left is a full bedroom and bath , closet , entrance to basement and access to the garage. Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor where you are greeted with an open floor plan of your main living space which consist of your living room, gourmet kitchen with beautiful black quartz counter tops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher , refrigerator ,walk-in pantry, formal dining room, powder room and patio. Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!
1426 Kenilworth St

title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

title: BEAUTIFUL (2BR+1BA) Home For Single Family
description:
Turn of the century historic house in sought after serene location on cute and quiet side street, just a one minute walk into the heart of the community. Beautifully updated with current understated style and high-quality materials, the first Bed is bright, open and comprised of two unusually large rooms: LR, FDR, and kitchen that flow together from front to back, plus a window and half bath. There are beautiful wood floors throughout, original beams in the living room ceiling, new granite/stainless/shaker kitchen with five windows and full glass door that opens to rear yard area. The formal dining room is extra large with space for desk/office area. The second bed has antique wide board pine floors, full bath and two bedrooms. BR1 is spacious and located in the front of the house with three windows and a window and walk-in closet. BR2 is average/medium size with two windows and BR2 still has three windows. The furnace and air conditioning system are state of the art and high-efficiency with separate thermostat zones. There is parking space for two cars and there is yard space behind the house for gathering/outdoor dining. The location on the Cape side of Bourne is about 1/2 mi to Gray Gables Beach and about 1/10 mi to Gray Gables Market or Lobster Trap. Easy access to the New Britain and getting on and off the cape via the Bourne Bridge. Very nice layout and home! Passing Title V in hand.
Strong income, credit and references are required. Bring in your pets, no smoking. utilities (propane, electric, municipal water) or snow clearing services (plowing/shoveling) of the two parking space areas or walkways near the house are included. Landlord provides basic snow plowing of driveway and lawn mowing services.

title: Beautiful 1 bedroom available now at 4122 Haverford st!
description:
Blending relaxation and sophistication to create the ideal place, 4122 Haverford offers one-bedroom luxury apartments located in an affordable up-and-coming district just north of University City, adjacent to the Drexel University athletic field complex. This 10-unit building located in West Powelton has 8 apartments on the Haverford Avenue side and 2 apartments on the Brandywine Street side, with the Brandywine apartments (units 9 & 10) including 2-car parking each. Street parking is abundantly available for all other tenants. Stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and garbage disposal, a multi-camera security system, intercom system with remote door buzzer, code access, linen closet, hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, granite counters, kitchen pantry, contemporary tile flooring in bathrooms, separate heat/air in bedroom and living areas, sprinkler system, extra tenant storage space in building, LED lighting, large windows and large closets are just some of the great amenities this property has to offer! Close proximity to University City and downtown Philadelphia gives you immediate access to the downtown area without paying downtown prices!
Fantastic 1BR unit in great location. This unit is located on the first floor of the building.
Plenty of street parking outside.
Large living space. Great size bedroom. Washer/Dryer in the unit. Plenty of closet space.
Small dogs allowed, cats allowed. Pet fee is $40 monthly per pet.
In addition to monthly rent, tenant is responsible for their own electricity bill, a water fee of $40 & a liability insurance fee of $9.50

title: Renovated 1 bedroom available now at 4800 Brown street!
description:
Experience forward-thinking urban living.
1, 2 & 3 bedroom luxury loft-style apartments located in an affordable up-and-coming district just north of University City make up this 34-unit complex. We offer thoughtful architecture and design creating a contemporary feel in an old factory setting. Elevator access, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and garbage disposal, a multi-camera security system, intercom system with remote door buzzer, on-site laundry, high ceilings, custom cabinetry with self-closing hardware, granite counters, kitchen pantry, exposed brick & concrete in many units, tile flooring, central heat & air, LED lighting, extra large commercial sized windows, large closets and large bright common hallways will be more than enough to make you want to come home!
Live the uptown urban lifestyle you crave!

title: Beautiful Renovated 1BD/1BTH House for rent
description: This lovely 1-Bedroom condo is located at Woodstream Condominiums in Delaware County! Located in Secane, you will have easy access to plenty of great restaurants, shops, and entertainment in the area while also having easy access to the Secane Train Station located further down South Ave. This condo will be available in mid-April and we're accepting applications NOW! This condo is located on the third floor of the building which ensures plenty of privacy. Upon entry into the condo, you'll immediately fall in love with the spacious living room complete with carpet flooring, tall ceilings, and large windows which allow tons of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly open and bright. There is a dining area located directly off of the living room which is large enough to accommodate a four-seat dining set with ease! The kitchen is located right next to the dining area which offers plenty of convenience when preparing and serving meals. The kitchen includes parquet flooring, light oak cabinets, formica countertops, full-sized refrigerator, four-burner electric range, and dishwasher - no need to wash your dishes by hand! The bedroom is spacious and includes carpet flooring, large windows, and a massive closet which should be large enough to accommodate your entire wardrobe! There is certainly no shortage of space throughout the bedroom since it is large enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed and complete bedroom set with ease. The bathroom is located in the hallway and includes stone tile flooring, vanity with plenty of storage, and a full-sized bathtub/shower with an incredible tile surround! In addition to all of the great features included throughout the apartment, there is also access to a storage locker in the basement and a shared laundry room!

title: Message for West Philly Renters
description: University City is encroaching on West Philly again, pushing out low income workers, artists and neighbors who've lived here for 30+ years. Rents are getting close to double what they were before the pandemic, with studios and 1beds cracking 1k, 2 bedrooms going for ~$1500 and 3 bedrooms going close to 2k, even past 52nd Street. What could be the motive other than pushing people out who can't afford these price hikes? What happens when the taxes in these areas rise with the cost of living, forcing lifelong Philadelphians out of our homes? This is a reminder that we are the market. We don't have to accept landlords price gouging. Even if you think you can afford it, it's unacceptable for the average salary in Philly to be  ~30k range and for anyone to be paying half their wages on rent. Stick together and let's get these prices back down to something reasonable or we'll all be struggling to make ends meet. For the good of all.

title: 109 W Wildey St - Studio
description:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #307! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School in Northern Liberties. Unit #307 is a bright Studio 1-bathroom 3rd Floor apartment. Enter into a hallway with high ceilings and cement floors that stretch the full length of the unit. Your living space is spacious and bright, boasting large windows for sunlight and an L-shaped floor plan to easily separate your living room and bedroom areas. The open galley kitchen offers white cabinetry, a gas oven/stove, a refrigerator, and a pantry. Bathroom features include tile flooring, a vanity for storage, a medicine cabinet, and a tiled bathtub. Located in a converted school building that brings a unique mix of old and new. There are FREE laundry rooms in the building, 1 on both the 1st & 2nd floors and 2 on the Penthouse Floor. Schedule a tour today!
Lease Terms:
Available May 1. Generally, the first month, last month, and one-month security deposit are due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on the owner’s approval and may require an additional fee and/or monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and/or monthly pet rent). Tenants are responsible for electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Water and gas are billed by a 3rd party company, Conservice.
Landlord Requirements:
Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, credit history to be considered (i.e. no active collections), no evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history with on-time rental payments. Exceptions to this criteria may exist under the law and will be considered.
Please reach out at through the listing: https://jg-realestate.com/listing/109-w-wildey-st-307/

title: Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium. Located at 1600 Arch Street in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, Unit 1010 is an exceptional studio apartment with premium finishes and fixtures. The apartment contains a washer/dryer, dishwasher, ample pantry space, two closets, hardwood flooring, a high ceiling, and a modernized kitchen and bathroom. The Phoenix boasts a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, curated amenity space, including a state-of-the-art fitness center and weight room, a resident lounge with event space, a conference room, a bike storage room, and a spacious outdoor terrace with stunning views. Additional amenities include a full-service restaurant (Tir Na Nog Irish Bar and Grill), Starbucks, WSFS Bank, and a recently announced grab-and-go mart on the concourse level. The Phoenix is situated near some of the finest parks, restaurants, and shopping Philadelphia has to offer, with City Hall and Dilworth Park directly across the street. It is conveniently located with elevator access to Suburban Station and minutes from major thoroughfares I-95 and I-76. Tenant responsible for utilities. One-time move-in/move-out fee of $400. Valet parking and storage available for additional fees.
1600-18 Arch St #1010

title: 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts modern amenities
description:
Welcome to 90 E Laurel St #B, a stunning bilevel apartment located in the highly sought-after Northern Liberties neighborhood of Philadelphia. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts modern amenities and a prime location for an unbeatable rental experience. The open floor plan and stylish finishes create a bright and airy feel throughout the space, making it perfect for those who value comfort and style. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of cabinet space, while the living area is perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing after a long day. Both bedrooms are generously sized and located on separate levels for added privacy, with ample closet space for all your storage needs. In addition, this unit comes with off-street parking and in-unit laundry, making daily life more convenient and enjoyable. The rooftop deck is one of the highlights of this apartment, providing stunning views of the city skyline. Whether you want to soak up the sun, enjoy a meal al fresco, or simply relax with friends and family, the rooftop provides the perfect setting. The in-unit washer and dryer also add to the convenience and comfort of living at 90 E Laurel St #B. The Northern Liberties neighborhood is known for its vibrant atmosphere, with some of the best restaurants, shops, and entertainment that the city has to offer. With a Walk Score of 97, daily errands are a breeze and public transportation options are easily accessible. You'll never run out of things to do in this bustling neighborhood, whether you want to explore

title: New fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic distri
description:
Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. The building has been home to prominent Philadelphia families such as Dr. John Hooker Packard, one of the most prominent American surgeons of the late 19th century; and the Philadelphia lawyer, Earl B. Putnam. Later covered to apartments in 1945, the most recent renovation was finalized in October 2022. The building holds eight (8) stunning brand-new units offering high-end appliances, including trash compactors, elevator access and lovely views of Center City. There are a variety of floor plans available for those seeking 1 to 3 bedrooms and you won't have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has a wash/ dryer in the unit. With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. Transportation is a breeze, with countless bus routes around the corner and just a quick stroll to the BSL. *pictures may be of similar unit*
1924-26 Spruce St #3R
